p: In order to determine eligibility to receive publicly purchased antivirals, 24 of the 31 LHDs reporting that publicly purchased antivirals were dispensed for patient use in their jurisdiction instituted verification procedures. Fifty four percent of theses LHDs reported using pharmacists or dispensing sites to determine eligibility status, 46% reported that physicians provided proof of eligibility, and 25% indicated that patients self-reported their eligibility status. Six LHDs did not require any eligibility verification.
